DOC.brief_title: Home-Based Symptom Monitoring : Its Impact Cancer Care Team Behaviors Patient Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly assign one two group . One group offer Internet assist home-based symptom reporting system Cancer Symptom Monitor ( CSM ) twelve-month study period . Patient care team evaluation measure use quantitative qualitative method ( via focus group ) . The second group receive `` standard care '' without home-based symptom monitoring . Both group evaluate baseline , 1 , 2 , 3 , 6 , 9 , & 12 month , symptom level overall quality life twelve-month study period .
